trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality for a data source designer.
trans-unit.target: 定義資料來源設計工具的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface defines an interface through which you can implement basic services for a data source designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>介面定義，您可以透過此實作基本的服務資料來源設計工具的介面。

trans-unit.source: A designer is only active at design time, and must be associated with a data source, using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>, in order to be loaded when a data source of the associated type is created at design time.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具才可以在設計階段，而且必須是關聯的資料來源，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>，以建立資料來源的相關聯的類型是在設計階段時載入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface provides methods and properties that you can implement in order to provide custom behavior at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>介面會提供方法和屬性，您可以實作以在設計階段提供自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: A designer can also use the available design-time services to perform a variety of tasks, including surveying the current design-time environment for components and their properties, reading and setting the values of properties of components, managing the toolbox, managing selected components, or displaying a user interface that can be used to configure values or to apply further processing.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具來執行管理工作，包括調查目前的設計階段環境的元件和其屬性、 讀取及設定的元件屬性的值不同也可以使用可用的設計階段服務[工具箱]，管理選取的元件，或顯示使用者介面，可用來設定值，或適用於進一步處理。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, implement your custom designer for a data source by deriving it from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，衍生來實作您的資料來源的自訂設計工具從<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>類別。

trans-unit.source: Data sources whose associated designer does not derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> are displayed in the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源的相關聯的設計工具不是衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>會顯示在元件匣中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface and provides additional design-time support that may be of use to authors of designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>類別會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>介面，並提供可能用來決定的設計工具的作者的其他設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the reference documentation for these classes.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱這些類別的參考文件。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of creating design components, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).
trans-unit.target: 如需建立設計元件的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying data source has a configuration wizard that can be launched with the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源具有可以使用 <see langword="true" /> 方法啟動的組態精靈則為 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying data source can refresh its schema; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果基礎資料來源可以重新整理其結構描述則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Launches the underlying data source's configuration wizard.
trans-unit.target: 啟動基礎資料來源的組態精靈。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個方法，只有當<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data source has changed in a way that affects data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 當變更資料來源的方式會影響資料繫結控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event occurs when the value of a field in the data source, or a property in the data-bound control that affects the data bindings to that field, has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>資料來源中，欄位或屬性會影響資料繫結至該欄位中，資料繫結控制項中的值變更時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of a view in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源中的檢視名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> for the specified view.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之檢視的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> containing information about the identified view, or <see langword="null" /> if a view with the specified name is not found.
trans-unit.target: 包含已識別檢視之相關資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" />，如果找不到具有指定名稱的檢視，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> can define a view in a way that is useful within the context of that class.
trans-unit.target: 類別可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>可以是該類別的內容中很有用的方式定義的檢視。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method to get a list of view names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>方法來取得一份檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of the views in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料來源中的檢視名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 類型為 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.
trans-unit.target: 指出在重新整理結構描述時是否要抑制任何引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 重新整理基礎資料來源的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: Resumes raising data source events after calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents" /> 方法之後，繼續引發資料來源事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the fields or data of the underlying data source have changed.
trans-unit.target: 當基礎資料來源的欄位或資料已變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: Suppresses all events raised by a data source until the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 抑制資料來源所引發的所有事件，直到呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" /> 方法為止。
